attributes.action: Ban hoodies sold in newquay, yellow on red, in local shops to avoid confusion between the general public and trained lifeguards. This confusion has already caused the drowning of one person in the town.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The citizens of Newquay and their visitors are tired of seeing people wear lifeguard hoodies during the summer season whike RNLI Lifeguards are on duty as this has caused confusion in the general public.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
